insert into tb_ngx_log (log_time, uri, host, request, requestUri, requestBody, requestMethod, requestTime, upstreamResponseTime, isArgs, args, status, uid, httpHost, referer, ua, upstreamAddr, proxyaddxforwardedFor, httpXForwardedFor, nginxVersion) values
(#{item.time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestBody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.upstreamResponseTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isArgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.args,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{item.uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.httpHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.referer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.upstreamAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.proxyaddxforwardedFor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.httpXForwardedFor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.nginxVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into tb_ngx_log (log_time, uri, host, requestMethod, requestTime, upstreamResponseTime, status, uid, httpHost,ua, upstreamAddr, proxyaddxforwardedFor, httpXForwardedFor, nginxVersion) values
